title: Post game stats not showing
body:
Hello,

I've had this problem for a while where the post game stats most of the time don't show up. It gets stuck in the loading part where I can click the skipping button, and sometimes there is a popup saying the client has timed out.

Can anybody help?

Thank you

replies.body: Timing out or getting stuck waiting for stats may be due to a connection issue with your network reaching our server.  I recommend using our [Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to help troubleshoot and get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
